specialpages-group-aiseometa: Name of the special page group for AI SEO Meta
aiseometatest: Title of the AISEOMetaTest special page
aiseometaquery: Title of the AISEOMetaQuery special page
aiseometabatch: Title of the AISEOMetaBatch special page
aiseometa-page-title: Label for the page title input field
aiseometa-query-submit: Button text to submit the query
aiseometa-invalid-page: Error message when an invalid page is entered
aiseometa-result-title:
Header for the query result. Parameters:
* $1 - The page title
aiseometa-last-updated: Label for the last updated time
aiseometa-never: Text shown when the page has never been processed
aiseometa-no-tags: Text shown when no tags are found
aiseometa-job-pushed:
Success message when a job is pushed. Parameters:
* $1 - The page title
aiseometa-batch-title: Header for the batch regenerate section
aiseometa-batch-pages: Label for the batch pages textarea
aiseometa-batch-help: Help text for the batch pages textarea
aiseometa-batch-submit: Button text to submit the batch job
aiseometa-batch-success:
Success message for batch jobs. Parameters:
* $1 - Number of jobs pushed
aiseometa-test-title: Header for the AI provider test section
aiseometa-test-message: Label for the test message input field
aiseometa-test-submit: Button text to submit the test message
aiseometa-test-success: Success message prefix for the AI response
aiseometa-test-error:
Error message when the AI test fails. Parameters:
* $1 - The error message
